verbs.description: Some writers [V: are] saying that Martin Luther gave us Donald Trump . But they get Luther all wrong .
[ARG0: Some writers] are [V: saying] [ARG1: that Martin Luther gave us Donald Trump . But they get Luther all wrong] .
Some writers are saying that [ARG0: Martin Luther] [V: gave] [ARG2: us] [ARG1: Donald Trump] . But they get Luther all wrong .
Some writers are saying that Martin Luther gave us Donald Trump . But [ARG0: they] [V: get] [ARG1: Luther all wrong] .
